name: RUN CORGI, RUN
description:
run corgi run is a fast-paced platformer, where 99.9% of levels are randomly generated.

Run through some caves to save your corgi friend !

happy corgsmas :3

version 1.1 changelog

- fixed an issue where you'd fall in the wall

- fixed some bug with double jumping

- cleaned up the menu

- made the 2nd zone a bit nicer to look at (A BIT)

- added gamepad support :D
